name: Cell Machine AMTI
description:
the WebGL build has some missing functionality

A mod of Cell machine mystic mod that improves the textures, the buttons and re-adds the option to edit as well as play imported levels

Source code: https://github.com/AppaBTW/CMMM-AMTI

features

fixed texture colors and shadows

fixed button colors when hovered and pressed

re-added the option to play imported levels

and a port for CMMM+
